attributes.action: Call a general election, let the people decide who should govern our country.
attributes.background: Liz Truss has resigned today, our country faces significant challenges which have worsened since she became leader/PM. She was chosen by a tiny and unrepresentative number of Tory party voters. It’s time for the people to democratically decide who should govern our country.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
